data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 63,943 believers in the state of Northern with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Northern, Sierra Leone
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,118,180 lost people in  Northern, Sierra Leone have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Northern, Sierra Leone.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Northern, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Northern, Sierra Leone know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Loko people.
Father, help the 63,943 believers in Northern to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Northern, Sierra Leone.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Northern, Sierra Leone has a population of 1,285,300.

We estimate Northern has 63,943 people who might know Jesus, 103,178 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,118,180 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 20 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Northern, Sierra Leone to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.
